Attacks.Name: Intercontinental Hydrogen
News: Trump nuked {target}, {deaths} killed by the initial blast. {target_ruler} is confused about the unprovoked attack.
The light of a thousand suns decented on {target}. Killing {deaths} souls in an instance.

Attacks.Name: Twitter
News:
Donald J. Trump @realDonaldTrump {time}:

{target_ruler} is an idiot. Just look at his hands, tiny! Total disaster!

Donald J. Trump @realDonaldTrump {time}:

Look at the poor people in {target}! They let some bad people in. So sad!

Defences.Name: NSA Cyber Defence
News: NSA intercepted some hackers. All is good.

LoosingSpeech: It was supposed to be great. Sad!
Name: America First
